meanings.sent1: Her largeheartedness was evident in the way she always helped those in need.
meanings.sent2: The community was touched by his largeheartedness when he donated to the local charity.
meanings.sent3: His largeheartedness was so great that he even shared his last cookie with his friend.
meanings.sent4: The largeheartedness of the volunteers warmed the hearts of everyone at the shelter.
meanings.sent5: The largeheartedness of the stranger left a lasting impact on the young boy.

meanings.definition: The quality of being compassionate or understanding
meanings.sent1: The teacher's largeheartedness towards her students made them feel supported and cared for.
meanings.sent2: In times of trouble, her largeheartedness shone through as she comforted those around her.
meanings.sent3: The largeheartedness of the judge was evident in the fair and just decisions made in court.
meanings.sent4: His largeheartedness was like a beacon of light in a world filled with darkness.
meanings.sent5: The largeheartedness of the nurse brought comfort to the patients in the hospital.
